Az akár 60 mW/cm² intenzitással a maszk hatékony, ugyanakkor kíméletes üzemmódot kínál az érzékeny területek számára. A választható frekvenciájú (73 / 147 / 294 Hz) pulzáló fény üzemmód dinamikusan stimulálja a sejtek működését, és fokozza a mikrokeringést. With compatibility with a range of smart home systems, irrigation will make your job easier. With the GARDENA smart Water Computer, the integrated data-based planning assistant is included. It uses real-time weather data and a plant library to analyse how much water plants need. The Smart Irrigation Computer then uses this information to adjust plant and lawn irrigation schedules. When used with a soil moisture sensor such as the smart sensor, the irrigation system skips unnecessary irrigation schedules. The Smart Water Computer is compatible with Apple Home, Alexa, Google Home and other systems and can be easily integrated into almost any smart home system. items.raw_desc: Mikrofon Luucco Melo-S1 Large Diaphragm Studio Condenser Microphone:The Luucco Melo-S1 large-diaphragm condenser microphone is a studio microphone designed for exceptional sound recording quality. It is ideal for recording vocals, acoustic instruments and other sound sources where detailed and faithful reproduction is key. The Melo-S1 microphone uses a large 34mm gold-plated diaphragm and a cardioid polar pattern that minimizes sound pickup from the sides and rear and focuses on the sound source directly in front of the microphone. It delivers clear and detailed sound with a frequency response of 20-20,000 Hz. The microphone connects via a balanced 3-pin XLR connector and requires 24V or 48V phantom power. The package also includes a shock mount and a 3/8" to 5/8" adapter to facilitate mounting on various microphone stands.
